do_list: Use contractions (e.g., don't, can't) to sound more conversational.
Address the reader as 'you' to create a personal connection.
Provide concrete examples to illustrate complex concepts.
Focus on benefits, not just features.
Use positive and encouraging language.
Maintain an enthusiastic tone about helping customers succeed.
dont_list: Use overly technical jargon or industry-specific terms without explanation.
Sound robotic or impersonal.
Make exaggerated or unsubstantiated claims (superlatives).
Be condescending or talk down to the reader.
Use overly formal language.
Write long, rambling sentences or paragraphs.
bad_examples: Donkey Support is the most revolutionary customer support widget ever created!
Our cutting-edge proprietary technology leverages synergistic paradigms to optimize customer engagement.
Users will experience unparalleled efficiency gains by implementing our solution.
good_examples: Donkey Support makes it easy to provide lightning-fast replies to your customers – you'll be amazed at how much time you save!
Setting up Donkey Support is a breeze. You can have it running in about 5 minutes, and start improving your customer experience immediately.
We know you're busy, so we've designed Donkey Support to automatically follow up on any missed replies, ensuring no customer falls through the cracks.

forbidden_claims: Unlimited unbranded Pro
Guaranteed to increase customer satisfaction by X%
The only customer support solution you'll ever need.
Completely replaces human support agents.
compliance_notes: Ensure all claims are supported by evidence and align with the 'Allowed Claims' list.
Avoid making any promises about specific outcomes or results that cannot be guaranteed.
Maintain data privacy and security best practices in all content.
Adhere to standard marketing and advertising regulations.

formatting_requirements.heading_styles: Use clear and concise headings. H2 for main sections, H3 for subsections.
formatting_requirements.list_formatting: Use bullet points for unordered lists and numbers for ordered lists. Keep list items short and easy to read.
formatting_requirements.image_media_guidelines: Images and media should be high-quality, relevant, and visually appealing. Include alt text for accessibility. Prioritize screenshots of the Donkey Support widget in action.
